p: We standardised the time axis as date when monitoring was initiated at each site. Initial analyses indicated a nonlinear relationship between A. petiolata performance measures and time. Therefore, we employed generalised additive mixed models (GAMMs) to evaluate change in A. petiolata performance over time. Generalised additive models are a nonparametric approach that can account for nonlinear relationships through splines (Hastie and Tibshirani, 1990).
